content: Encyclopedias and field guides

Am I mistaken? Or have your tastes changed?
Either way, I'm very curious,
what kind of <color=#8AAB4B>music</color> do you like now?
That's right.
I'm really curious, what kind of <color=#8AAB4B>movies</color> do you like best?
No, I love movies.

Table tennis is quite an interesting sport.
The nimble reflexes, the pulse of adrenaline...
Yeah, I felt all that from the spectator seats.
Black tea.
Slushie.

I know that drinking plain water is healthier.
But between health and happiness,
I lean more towards the happiness side of things.
Flavorful Noodles
I remember you like <color=#8AAB4B>{喜欢的音乐}</color>, right?
Actually, I prefer something else.

I'm curious though,
what interests you more than reading...?

Oh? So your tastes have changed?
So, what kind of <color=#8AAB4B>movies</color> do you like now?
Yep!

If you don't mind, could I have a moment of your time?
There are some things I've been curious about...
Yes, about you.
Mystery novel.
Correct. I don't like reading.

That's great! So...{短暂停}
Where would you like to sit in the audience?
Lemonade.

You can even smell the ocean
from the sushi!
I remember, you don't like <color=#8AAB4B>sports</color>, right? Just like me.
Jazz

Don't like music?
Fair enough, there are countless wonders in this world.
Like the sounds of nature - they can be just as soothing to the soul.
Many say that being immersed in a romance movie is like experiencing a heart-wrenching farewell... Perhaps it's the realization that crying so easily at a movie means your "tears are worthless"?
Well then, next time I make this dish, you absolutely have to come over and try it!
I think friends are bound to share common hobbies and interests.\nSo, is it okay if I ask you about your interests?
If I remember correctly, you really like <color=#8AAB4B>{喜欢的运动}</color>, right?

But in my view, {短暂停}
Truth carries its own immense weight.

My first thought was that I have to tell <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> about it!
Want to go give it a try the next time we have a chance?
I'm not really into music.
Enjoys playing golf.
No, I love sports.

It makes my taste buds feel like they're playing a lottery,
What flavor will appear next?
Will it be salty, or sweet and sour?
sushi
I'm subscribed to different magazines too, including fashion, home decor, and film magazines. They are like windows that give me a glimpse into the world of fashion and different lifestyles.
Oh? So your reading tastes have changed? Tell me, what kind of <color=#8AAB4B>books</color> do you like now?

Changed your mind?
So, what kind of <color=#8AAB4B>sports</color> do you like now?

Hm? Did I get that wrong?
So now, what's your favorite <color=#8AAB4B>drink</color>?
Likes volleyball.

Volleyball is such a wild team sport.
Need a teammate? I could give it a try.
If you don't mind having a beginner...
Steamed Fish

I get it - you're a foodie who loves everything!
With so many delicious options, why should we only pick one?
You've opened up a whole new way of thinking!
I remember. Didn't you say you don't read <color=#8AAB4B>books</color> at all?
Sci-fi movie.
Oh, I see. Then... you must have another hobby that occupies your time on the couch, right?
I love all kinds of food

Delightful lemonade with a few ice cubes.
(In my imagination) Tangy, sweet, and refreshingly cool -
The perfect pick-me-up!

(微笑)Unfortunately, I tend to overcook it...
If it wasn't so easy to make,
I probably wouldn't keep trying.

Oh? Have your tastes changed?
Then what's your favorite <color=#8AAB4B>food</color> now?
So, I remember you really like watching <color=#8AAB4B>{喜欢的电影}</color>, right?
I remember that you didn't like listening to <color=#8AAB4B>music</color>, right?
Pop

Let me guess,
while reading, you were secretly
trying to outsmart the author?
Trying to figure out the "tricks" from each page?

Reality and fantasy, present and future.
A good sci-fi film isn't just about wild visual effects,
It conceals many profound truths about life that are hard to grasp...
I do read.
Maybe it's because I enjoy reading, but what you said has had an effect on me. It's only natural that everyone has things that they dislike.
I remember you saying that you don't like <color=#8AAB4B>drinks</color>?

Ah, I see.
Many people are enchanted by jazz melodies and improvisation,
And you seem to be one of them.

Well isn't that a coincidence!
Though some people might say
documentaries aren't "dramatic" enough,
Oh? What kind of <color=#8AAB4B>music</color> do you like to listen to?
Oh? And what kind of <color=#8AAB4B>books</color> do you like?

High five! Oh... pardon me.
I don't like the feeling of being sweaty either,
so I got a bit carried away when you mentioned that.
Not anymore.
Yes! That's what I like.

Great! I remembered correctly.
So, when should we go to the bookstore together?
Oh? What kind of <color=#8AAB4B>movies</color> do you like?

But I prefer sweeter drinks.
Sour ones are only good when I'm feeling sleepy!
Nope. I do have a favorite type of food.
I don't like sports.
I might sound like I know what I'm talking about, but honestly, I only experience the thrill of sports from the sidelines.
I remember you said earlier that you don't have a favorite <color=#8AAB4B>food</color>, right?
No, I prefer a different genre.

Shaved ice! You've mentioned something I find so mysterious,
the way different flavors are layered
beneath the ice,
Nope. Incorrect.
Yep. I eat anything and everything.
What a wonderful coincidence. I'll dig out some nice classical music records and we can drift off into our dreams together.
Romance movie

If I can find the right ingredients,
I'd love to make some steamed fish as an extra dish today.
Oh? What kind of <color=#8AAB4B>sports</color> do you like now?
I remember. You like reading <color=#8AAB4B>{喜欢的书}</color>, don't you?
I remember you said you don't watch <color=#8AAB4B>movies</color> at all, right?
I remember your favorite food is <color=#8AAB4B>{喜欢的食物}</color>?

Great! I found a friend who shares the same hobby as me.
Almost all of the encyclopedias in the library
were borrowed by me.
Do you read each page in order? Or do you jump to different pages at random?

Hmm, when it comes to you,
You always leave quite an impression. (laughs)
Correct. I'm not really into music.

Hmm, seems I remembered correctly.
So, there must be some other hobby
that's been occupying your attention, right?
Huh? There are so many different kinds of drinks, but there's nothing that you particularly like? How peculiar...

Sushi! We definitely have similar tastes.
I love watching the chef's hands dance,
before serving up a work of art.
I remember you like <color=#8AAB4B>{喜欢的饮料}</color> the most, right?
I think people who love mystery and detective stories\nmust have a strong sense of curiosity,\nand minds that love to stay active and thinking.
Yes, I actually prefer drinking water.

There are so many good books, I'm having trouble choosing!
What kind of <color=#8AAB4B>books</color> do you like to read?

Food is an essential part of life.
So I was wondering,
what's your favorite <color=#8AAB4B>food</color>?

No, that wasn't me.
I could never say anything that profound.
It's from a film magazine's review of sci-fi movies.
I don't like drinking beverages.
No, that's not the food I like.

Love classical music? Me too!
Especially before bed, accompanied by elegant and wonderful melodies,
Slowly drifting off to the shores of dreams.

I suddenly realized why popular music is called popular music,
it's because it brings people together,
and allows us to experience the joy of it together.
They often act as great conversation starters at the dinner table when I have my friends over for dinner.
That's right.
I never study people, but I'm truly curious about you. Do you mind if I ask you some trivial questions?

For example, when it comes to sports.
Do you prefer individual sports,
or team sports?
Documentary.
Yes.

Are you drawn in by its rich taste and aroma?
They say when the noodles are cooked just right,
you can really savor that perfect chewy texture.
What genre of <color=#8AAB4B>music</color> do you like the most?
I don't watch movies.
Loves playing ping pong.
No, actually I've found my favorite drink!

What's your favorite <color=#8AAB4B>drink</color>?
I'd really like to know.
I don't read books.

You don't read at all?
Maybe because I love reading so much,
I just... can't quite understand that.
Classical music
Yes, that's right. I don't watch movies.

Such elegant taste! Just like mine.
Nothing beats a fragrant cup of hot black tea (想象中)
after a long, tiring day.
I'm always listening to music!

A chef always loves a guest who isn't a fussy eater,
So I can invite you to have a taste of any new dishes that I cook right?
No matter what concoctions I cook up.
Oh? Now you've got me curious. So tell me, what's your favorite <color=#8AAB4B>drink</color>?
Oh? What kind of <color=#8AAB4B>food</color> do you like?
That's great! So, for the next sports day, do you want to go with me to...\nthe spectator bleachers?

What a coincidence, I'm also a big fan of authentic cuisine like this.
The delicate texture of the fish combined with the bold aroma of the seasonings...
Oh no, all this talk is making me hungry.

So if you hear any pop songs you really like,
would you mind sharing them with me?
I rarely listen to pop music.
Magazine
I've noticed that if you're not into music at all, you must have some other hobby that's captured your attention, right?
Nope.

Great! I didn't get that wrong.
So, when should we go watch a movie together?

Golf requires focus, precision, and strategy - 
it's a sport that lets you become one with nature.

I'm not really into romance movies though,
so I've only heard about it. (laughs)
That's right.
Yes, I don't like sports.
